post.description: Register a new user with email and password.

get.description:
Return a Google OAuth consent URL. The client should pass the redirect_uri that will receive the code.
Example redirect_uri: com.example.net:/oauth2redirect

post.description:
Exchange an authorization code for tokens and return an application JWT.

Request body: { "code": "...", "redirect_uri": "<registered-redirect-uri>" }

Verify a Google ID token from the mobile/web app and create an application session.

The Flutter app uses the google_sign_in package which provides the ID token.
This endpoint verifies the token with Google and returns an application JWT.

Request body: { "id_token": "<Google ID token>" }
Rotate and return a new access token. Refresh token is read from httpOnly cookie.
Revoke refresh token and clear cookie.

get.description: List questions with pagination and optional filters.

parameters.name: include_user_attempt

schema.description: Include the current user's latest attempt
schema.title: Include User Attempt

parameters.description: Include the current user's latest attempt

post.description: Create a new question with parts and options.

get.description: Get a single question by ID with all parts and options.

put.description: Update a question. If parts or options are provided, they replace existing ones.

delete.description: Delete a question (cascade deletes parts and options).

post.description: Link a question to a taxonomy node.

get.description: List taxonomy links for a question.

post.description: Replace existing taxonomy links for a question with the provided list.

Submit an attempt for a single question (standalone mode).
Creates a 'standalone' QuizAttempt wrapper implicitly.
Record a view of a question (without attempting).

Upload a media file (image, video, audio, or document).

Returns the media metadata including URL and storage key.

delete.description: Delete a media file and its record.

schema.title: Response List Media Api V1 Media  Get
Response Get Taxonomy Tree Api V1 Taxonomy Tree Get

get.description: List quizzes; current_user injected if authenticated (optional).

schema.title: Response List Quizzes Api V1 Quizzes Get

get.description: List published quizzes; current_user injected if authenticated (optional).

schema.title: Response List Published Quizzes Api V1 Quizzes Published Get

post.description: Create a QuizVersion snapshot. Provide question_ids explicitly since quizzes don't currently link questions.

Start a quiz attempt.

If `version_id` is provided, use that QuizVersion. Otherwise resolve the latest published QuizVersion for the quiz.
Mark a quiz attempt as finished, compute final totals and mark completed.

get.description: Return the full graded review of a completed quiz attempt.

schema.title: Response Get My Taxonomy Tree Api V1 Stats Me Taxonomy Tree Get

post.description:
Create a new quiz attempt.

This endpoint must be called before starting to answer questions via WebSocket.
Returns the attempt ID that should be used in the WebSocket URL.

Supports two modes:
- With quiz_id: User takes a specific quiz
- Without quiz_id: User answers random/standalone questions

get.description: List all attempts for a specific question by the current user.

schema.title: Response List Question Attempts Api V1 Questions  Question Id  Attempts Get

get.description: Get statistics for a specific question for the current user.

quiz_id.title: Quiz Id
quiz_id.description: Optional ID of the quiz. If None, creates standalone attempt for random questions

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: Optional ID of the user (ignored if authenticated)

id.title: Id

quiz_id.title: Quiz Id
quiz_id.description: ID of the quiz (None if standalone attempt)

CreateQuizAttemptResponse.title: CreateQuizAttemptResponse
